content: the barley bandana crochet pattern was created with the spring and summer in mind with beautiful barley inspired stitch work this accessory will be a great addition to your wardrobe with toddler child and adult sizes all included you can even mommy and me your garden head covering this year pattern is written in us terms and comes with instructions for 3 sizes toddler child and adult fingering weight yarn and g hook includes some instructional photos includes gauge and measurements basic level pattern simple stitches but lots of counting to keep placement on track digital download will be received through email after purchase no returns on digital items light pink version tested and photographed by instagram com/coycrochet yellow version tested and photographed by instagram com/littlemoonstitchco
